divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out my window in the early morning, and i happened to look up and a round "disc" like flying object zoomed (cant think of a different description) into the sky EXTREMELY fast. Then, completely stopped over a tree that was across the street, behind a house. It stationary, but it was spinning in place. While it was spinnging, there was a big, blue, diamond shaped light and it was VERY bright. As I kept looking at the light i noticed that the ship was beautiful. It was the brightest silver I have ever seen and it was perfectly clean not one spot. There were windows on it, i could see them, but i couldnt focus in on it enough to see inside of them. I wouldnt say that I was scared when i saw it, i would probably say I was more stunned than anything. My eyes got big as i saw it fly into the sky. Before I saw it, I was sitting in my room next to my window. I had starting the news. There was nothing interesting on so i looked out my window. I was probably staring for like 2-3 mintutes and then I saw it "zoom" into the sky. I automatically thought that it was a UFO once I first saw it. At that time i was thinking, "Am I seeing things?". After about 45 seconds to a minute of staring at it, it flew out of the sky very fast.
trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There were no other sightings in San Diego on or around January 13th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Flat, round, flying object with a blue diamond shaped light on the front.
